short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to get the latest climate Article (refreshes daily)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install this extension to get a new (one of the latest!) climate articles daily. Just click on the extension to check for the title and link of the latest article posted on climate change related topics.
